titleStmt.title: A catholike exposition vpon the Reuelation of Sainct Iohn. Collected by M. Augustine Marlorate out of diuers notable writers, whose names ye shal find in the page following
Novi Testamenti catholica expositio ecclesiastica. English. Selections
titleStmt.author: Marlorat, Augustin, 1506-1562.
Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Binneman, for L. Harison, and G. Bishop,

notesStmt.note: A translation of a section of: Novi Testamenti catholica expositio ecclesiastica.
Place and date of publication from colophon.
Running title reads: Malorats exposit. on the Reuelation of S. Iohn.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
